additional-notes: This is a Czech publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for it under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
